title: "I'm Watching Myself Watch This": Elon Musk Reacts To His Viral LOL Moment
content: Elon Musk accompanied Mr Trump, UFC chief executive Dana White, and Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard, country rock artist Kid Rock, RFK Jr, among others. Mr Trump's sons Eric and Don Jr were also in the audience for the bout.

title: Ocean Plankton Survived Ice Age But May Not Cope With Climate Change Now
content: In our new research, published today in Nature, we explored the ability of tiny marine organisms called plankton to adapt to global warming.
summary: In our new research, published today in Nature, we explored the ability of tiny marine organisms called plankton to adapt to global warming.

title: Explainer: How Trump May Bypass Senate To Install His Cabinet Picks
content: President-elect Donald Trump has said he might install his picks for top administration posts without first winning approval in the U.S. Senate. This would erode the power of Congress and remove a significant check on his authority as president.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump has said he might install his picks for top administration posts without first winning approval in the U.S. Senate. This would erode the power of Congress and remove a significant check on his authority as president.

title: How Trump's Abortion Policy May Impact Women's Reproductive Rights Globally
content: In the aftermath of the US election, much focus has been on the consequences for abortion rights across the US, and whether this will affect state-led initiatives to roll back restrictive legislation.
summary: In the aftermath of the US election, much focus has been on the consequences for abortion rights across the US, and whether this will affect state-led initiatives to roll back restrictive legislation.

title: Woman-Run Cafe In Indonesia's Conservative Sharia Stronghold Shakes Stigma
content: In what claims to be the only woman-run cafe in the capital of Indonesia's most conservative province, owner Qurrata Ayuni says she and her baristas provide an alternative to rowdy, smoke-filled male haunts.

title: What Trump Camp, Putin, Zelensky Said After Biden's Missile Nod For Ukraine

title: After A Meteoric Rise, Artificial Intelligence Progress Now Slowing Down?

title: Opinion: The Pakistan-China Friendship Is Fast Turning Sour

title: China's 'Peace Call' For Ukraine After US Okays Strikes On Russia
content: China reiterated calls for a peaceful settlement to the war in Ukraine, after Washington cleared Kyiv to use long-range American missiles against military targets inside Russia.

title: Joe Biden Risking World War III With Missile Decision: Russian Lawmakers

title: UK PM Starmer To Seek 'Pragmatic' Chinese Ties In Meeting With Xi Jinping

title: Who Is New Zealand's MP Whose Traditional Maori Dance Video Went Viral

title: US Teens, In Stolen Car, Caught After High-Speed Chase Ends In Ball Of Fire
